name: TEDDY AND THE ERRORTITLENOTFOUND
description:
An abandoned game from the '80s was found after it had been considered lost to time. However, the game turned out to be corrupted, but still playable.

A project for me to learn Godot, this is my first game in the engine. 

Controlls:

WASD OR ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACE - SHOOT

WAIT 1 SEC FOR CHARGE SHOTS

1 HIT YOU'RE OUT

GREEN OBJECTS  ARE POWER-UPS
